II fldgi – wêlrK

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  
   fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel'  
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oe kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs  
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2016 foieïn¾ 23 jeks Èk m< lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2016 foieïn¾ ui 09 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï 
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh bf,lafg%dksl 
iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜

ie' hq'  -  (i)  Y%S ,xld cd;Hka;r fkap¾ ,úka ix.uh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2016 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 21 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld 
m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia  w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
 (ii)   foaYfha mdßißl m¾Ioh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2016 fkdjeïn¾ ui 04 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§ 
ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§' 
 (iii)   Èúke.=u ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2016 fkdjeïn¾ ui 18 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha           
II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§' 
ie' hq'-  2016'11'25 Èk m< jQ wxl 1"995 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : II ^w& iy IV ^w& fldgia m< fkdù h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2016'12'02
1708  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
n,msáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika ù ±kg j¾I 05lg jvd mer‚ jQ my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2016 j¾Ifha 
foieïn¾ ui 16 jeks Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¨iaid úkdY lsÍug iQokï lr we;' hïlsis md¾Yjlrejl=g 
fuu kvq jd¾;dj, iïmQ¾K fyda tys hïlsis fldgil iy;sl l< msgm;la ,nd .ekSug wjYH jkafka kï" tA i|yd b,a¨ï 
m;%hla 2016'12'16 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= fõ'
 rðkaød chiQßh"
 ufyia;%d;a$w;sf¾l Èid úksiqre"
 n,msáh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2016'12'02

msial,a úlsŒï
msial,a fjkafoaisfha úlsŒuhs
uyj Èid wêlrKfha § h
ixfYdaê; mßÈ jQ 1990 wxl 2 ork Kh wdmiq whlr .ekSfï 
úfYaI  úêúOdk mk; hgf;a iy Bg wkql+, ffkihs ;Skaÿ m%ldYhla 
i|yd b,a,Su ms<sn| ldrKfha § h'
fld<U 10 à' î' chd udjf;a" wxl 479 ^l,ska wxl 481& ork ia:dkfha 
,shd mÈxÑ ld¾hd,h iy .,a.uqj fl,skaùÈfha wxl 299 ys YdLd 
ld¾hd,hla mj;ajdf.k hk yegka keIk,a nEkala mSt,aiS' ^l,ska 
iSudiys; yegka keIk,a nexl=j f,i y÷kajkq ,enQ&
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''meñ‚,slre'
tÈßj
 rkafl;s foajf.a mshisß"
 wxl 321$2"
 fu;amd.u"
 wdKuvqj'
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''ú;a;slre'
uyj Èid wêlrKfha by; wxl ork 2015'01'12 jeks Èk ksh; lrk ,o ffkihs ;Skaÿ m%ldYhg wkqj ú;a;slre jk 
rkafl;s foajf.a mshisß hk wh úiska re' 10"74"442'47 l uqo,la i|yd 2014la jQ ud¾;= ui 01 jeks Èk isg iïmQ¾Kfhka 
f.jd ksu lrk f;la jirlg ishhg oy ;=khs oYu my ^13'5]& ne.ska fmd<sh o ^f.jk ,o uqo, wvq lsÍfuka miqj& ;j 
o" remsh,a 16"32"213'95 l ^f.jk ,o uqo, wvq lsÍfuka miq& uqo, i|yd 2014la jQ ud¾;= ui 01 jeks Èk isg iïmQ¾Kfhka 
f.jd ksu lrk f;la jirlg ishhg oyih ^16]& ne.ska fmd<sh o" kvq .dia;= o ú;a;slre úiska meñ‚,slreg f.úh hq;= 
njg ksfhda. lr we;s w;r" tlS f.ùï lsÍu i|yd ú;a;slre wfmdfydi;a ù we;s fyhska uyj Èid wêlrKfhka ud fj; 
,eî we;s weialSis n,m;%fha n,h msg ud úiska 2015 fkdjeïn¾ ui 17 jeks Èk ;ykug f.k we;s ú;a;slreg wh;a my;

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2016'12'02
1728  
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí' 
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ 
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'  
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnk  ish¨u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha  
th m< l< hq;= kï wjYH ixfYdaOkhka lr wdmiq  túh hq;=h' rcfha  uqøKd,h fj; ;eme,a  u.ska tjk ±kaùï  wm%udoj tys
